Articles.Content: While this seems like an interesting idea, in practice it's just a means of segregation of forum users by users.

Perhaps.

In any case, Kaspy's disabled the feature entirely for the present so it can't cause any more trouble. Shouldn't be any more shenanigans going around.

Perhaps.

In any case, Kaspy's disabled the feature entirely for the present so it can't cause any more trouble. Shouldn't be any more shenanigans going around.

And here was me, happily thinking that you meant disable the entire reputation system with that statement...

Guess I was wrong.
Why does this remind me of the Paragon-Renegade system of Mass Effect ?
Once upon a time there was a hardcore hater on the Elite: Dangerous forums. His rep bar was a brilliant red, just like his bloodshot eyes.
We meet again, Red Iron Crown. But now the student has become the master.
Only a master of evil, Green. Rep me down and I will become more powerful than you can ever imagine.
Whaah???????

We meet again, Red Iron Crown. But now the student has become the master.

He escaped? Red, you're supposed to keep him locked in basement level 7 at all times!
Clearly he has some sort of accomplice.
But... But... Why... WHAT?

Clearly he has some sort of accomplice.

*Camacha sneaks off stealthily.

Edited January 12, 2015 by Camacha
Well, I guess that answers my questions about collecting red bars!

we meet again, red iron crown. But now the student has become the master.

Quick! Kill it with green rep!
They say that the coming of Green Iron Crown is the first sign of the apocalypse.
Now we need a "Say Hello to the Dark Red Group" thread.
Does the red rep system have titles like the green rep one? e.g "Allowed to draw blueprints"? But for red rep it would be - "Never allowed to hold a pen"

Whaah???????

I concur with this statement.

Does the red rep system have titles like the green rep one? e.g "Allowed to draw blueprints"? But for red rep it would be - "Never allowed to hold a pen"

Yes! Though I don't think Negative rep should be a common thing, (we want this place to stay friendly, right?) this is a thing that should exist.

he escaped? Red, you're supposed to keep him locked in basement level 7 at all times!

THIS IS NOT A DRILL - FORUM LOCKDOWN INITIATED

Give rep to everyone!

Kill it with water!
I actually think that certain users should be able to give negative rep. It should be only available to users with a reputation and post count above 100, to prevent abuse though.
I think negative repping is a Bad Idea. The potential for trolling, vendetta, and hurt feelings is immense. Better IMO that we can lift others up but not bring them down.

I actually think that certain users should be able to give negative rep. It should be only available to users with a reputation and post count above 100, to prevent abuse though.

I'll just have you know that I'm not too far from 100 and I would abuse the crap out of a negative rep button even though I barely ever touch the rep button right now.

Green Iron Crown needs an SCP designation.

In the works, maybe.

Yeahhhhno. I mean, look at what happened when one or two people accidentally got given negative-rep. We have a five-page thread as a result of that. Granted, not all of it is complaining and freaking out, but it was at first.

As it currently stands, nobody has access to -rep, and that's probably the better way to do it. +rep is simply a much less troublesome metric.

I think negative repping is a Bad Idea. The potential for trolling, vendetta, and hurt feelings is immense. Better IMO that we can lift others up but not bring them down.

My (former) standing in a distant forum:

It's a lot better now but please don't look me up
